attributes.action: National Recognition of Tommy Flowers, William Tutte and their team's work at Bletchley Park
attributes.additional_details:
The undersigned believe that the work of the above and many at Bletchley Park's work has gone wihtout the full recognition it deserves.
Now, as much time has passed and the security considerations have lessened greatly, it is time that these men are recognised even though now sadly it must be posthumously.
Pehaps the naming of an educational institution, research facility or bursary for the same would be appropriate as it is sadly too late for an Honour.
